name: SvCA (Samurai vs Cowboy Aliens)
description:
Space Cowboys are falling from outer space! Defend your Lord's honor as the last Martian Samurai!

Move with the mouse and click to slash! The game gets harder the more Cowboys are killed! Good luck!

Code: rcm.aldo

Art: AntoReakk

Music and SFX: rcm.aldo and PointToPluto
